item.title: My Resume
item.description: Download My Resume Work Experience # 2022 - Present Tangram Flex - DevOps Engineer # 2022 - 2022 | 8 months | Tangram Flex - DevOps Engineer Intern # 2022 - Present | Cyber@UC - Head of Lab # 2019 - 2021 | 2 yrs & 3 mos | City of Centerville - IT Intern # Helped to deploy mission critical software and remedy issues with systems at the Centerville Police Department and dispatch center.

item.title: Building my Raspberry Pi Kubernetes Cluster
item.description: Over 2020 I have been learning everything I can about Kubernetes and container technologies and it has been a very fun and impactful experience. I started out using Docker-Desktop and minikube to get the basics of Docker and Kubernetes down.
